/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. Power lines crisscross above the street, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene.
